resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206340</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Unintentional Injury Prevention</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unbeabsichtigte Verletzung Verhinderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empêchement Involontaire de Dommages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prevenção Involuntária De Ferimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prevenzione Involontaria Di Ferita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούσια πρόληψη τραυματισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prevención Inintencional De Lesión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at trends in unintentional injuries in the U.S., and conducts research to better understand risk factors and methods to prevent these injuries. Research and prevention programs focus on two categories of unintentional injury: motor vehicle-related injuries and home and recreation related injuries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf Tendenzen in den unbeabsichtigten 
Verletzungen in den VEREINIGTEN STAATEN und Führungen Forschung, 
Gefahr Faktoren und Methoden besser zu verstehen, um diese 
Verletzungen zu verhindern. Forschung und Verhinderungprogramme 
konzentrieren auf zwei Kategorien unbeabsichtigte Verletzung: 
fahren Sie Träger-in Verbindung stehende Verletzungen und Haus 
und Erholung in Verbindung gestandene Verletzungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regards aux tendances dans des dommages 
involontaires aux ETATS-UNIS, et recherche de conduites de comprendre 
mieux des facteurs de risque et des méthodes pour empêcher ces 
dommages. Les programmes de recherches et d'empêchement se 
concentrent sur deux catégories des dommages involontaires : 
circulez en voiture les dommages et la maison véhicule-connexe 
et les dommages associés par récréation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhares em tendências nos ferimentos 
involuntários nos ESTADOS UNIDOS, e pesquisa das condutas compreender
mais melhor fatores e métodos de risco para impedir estes ferimentos.
Os programas da pesquisa e da prevenção focalizam em duas 
categorias de ferimento involuntário: viaje de automóvel os 
ferimentos e HOME veículo-relacionada e os ferimentos relacionados 
recreação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sguardi alle tendenze nelle lesioni involontarie 
negli STATI UNITI e ricerca di comportamenti capire più meglio i 
fattori ed i metodi di rischio per impedire queste lesioni. I 
programmi di prevenzione e di ricerca si concentrare su due categorie 
di ferita involontaria: vada in automobile le lesioni e sede 
veicolo-relativa e lesioni riferite ricreazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις τάσεις στους ακούσιους τραυματισμούς στις
ΗΠΑ, και πραγματοποιεί την έρευνα για να καταλάβει καλύτερα τους 
παράγοντες κινδύνου και τις μεθόδους για να αποτρέψει αυτούς τους
τραυματισμούς. Τα προγράμματα έρευνας και πρόληψης 
εστιάζουν σε δύο κατηγορίες ακούσιου τραυματισμού: 
όχημα-σχετικό με το τη μηχανή τραυματισμοί και σπίτι και 
σχετικοί με την αναψυχή τραυματισμοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">miradas en las tendencias en lesiones 
inintencionales en los ESTADOS UNIDOS, e investigación de las 
conductas de entender mejor factores y métodos de riesgo para 
prevenir estas lesiones. Los programas de la investigación y de
la prevención se centran en dos categorías de lesión inintencional:
viaje en automóvili lesiones y hogar vehi'culo-relacionado y 
lesiones relacionadas reconstrucción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206340</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106478</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/unintentional-injury-prevention</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
